languages.text: И открылись глаза тени Домин, и ответила она, что не ждала, и не скучала, и не желает ни долга, ни власти, ни милости, и не желает уходить, ибо чудовища, рожденные разумом ее, не были побеждены, а потому были сильны. Но затем поднялась она, и пошла за {mf|тем|той}, кому присягала. Ибо долг ее был превыше терзаний ума. Он — есть Смерть.

And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.
languages.original_text: И открылись глаза тени Домин, и ответила она, что не ждала, и не скучала, и не желает ни долга, ни власти, ни милости, и не желает уходить, ибо чудовища, рожденные разумом ее, не были побеждены, а потому были сильны. Но затем поднялась она, и пошла за {mf|тем|той}, кому присягала. Ибо долг ее был превыше терзаний ума. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: And the eyes of the Enim's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and would not leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were therefore strong. Yet after that, she got up and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the eyes of the Enim's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and would not leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were therefore strong. Yet after that, she got up and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. Ayen Kaen Dho.

However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the eyes of the Enim's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

languages.text: Und der Schattens {mf|des|der} Domin öffnete die Augen und sie entgegnete, dass sie nicht gewartet habe, {mf|ihn|sie} nicht vermisst habe, weder Pflicht, Macht noch Gnade wolle und nicht den Wunsch verspüre, zu gehen, da die von ihrem Verstand erschaffenen Monster noch nicht besiegt und noch immer mächtig seien. Doch dann erhob sie sich und folgte {mf|dem, den|der, die} zu beschützen sie einen Eid geschworen hatte. Denn ihre Pflicht überwog die Qualen ihres Verstandes. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Und der Schattens {mf|des|der} Domin öffnete die Augen und sie entgegnete, dass sie nicht gewartet habe, {mf|ihn|sie} nicht vermisst habe, weder Pflicht, Macht noch Gnade wolle und nicht den Wunsch verspüre, zu gehen, da die von ihrem Verstand erschaffenen Monster noch nicht besiegt und noch immer mächtig seien. Doch dann erhob sie sich und folgte {mf|dem, den|der, die} zu beschützen sie einen Eid geschworen hatte. Denn ihre Pflicht überwog die Qualen ihres Verstandes. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Y los ojos de la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin se abrieron, y replicó que ella no había estado esperando, no {mf|lo|la} había echado de menos, no buscaba ni deber, ni poder ni misericordia y no quería irse, pues los monstruos creados por su mente no habían sido derrotados y eran poderosos. Sin embargo, se irguió y siguió a a{mf|quel|quella} a quien había prestado juramento. Pues el sentido del deber era más fuerte que la tortura de su mente. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Y los ojos de la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin se abrieron, y replicó que ella no había estado esperando, no {mf|lo|la} había echado de menos, no buscaba ni deber, ni poder ni misericordia y no quería irse, pues los monstruos creados por su mente no habían sido derrotados y eran poderosos. Sin embargo, se irguió y siguió a a{mf|quel|quella} a quien había prestado juramento. Pues el sentido del deber era más fuerte que la tortura de su mente. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: そしてドミンの影の目が開いた。彼女は待っていたわけではなく、{mf|彼|彼女}を逃したわけでもなく、義務も権力も慈悲をも求めてはおらず、去るつもりもなかったと答えた。彼女の心が産み落とした怪物は打倒されておらず、まだ強かったからだ。しかし、彼女は自らの足で立ち上がると、誓いを立てた者の後を追った。彼女の役目は精神の苦しみを量がしていたからだ。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: そしてドミンの影の目が開いた。彼女は待っていたわけではなく、{mf|彼|彼女}を逃したわけでもなく、義務も権力も慈悲をも求めてはおらず、去るつもりもなかったと答えた。彼女の心が産み落とした怪物は打倒されておらず、まだ強かったからだ。しかし、彼女は自らの足で立ち上がると、誓いを立てた者の後を追った。彼女の役目は精神の苦しみを量がしていたからだ。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 秘者的影子睁开了双眼。她回答说，她并没有等待着{mf|他|她}，思念着{mf|他|她}。她说，她对责任、力量、怜悯没有任何渴望，也完全不想离开这里，因为由她的思想催生出来的怪物依然非常强大，她必须把它们全部消灭。但即便如此，她最终还是站起了身，追随着她曾发誓追随的那个人，因为她的责任感最终战胜了她心灵的煎熬。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 秘者的影子睁开了双眼。她回答说，她并没有等待着{mf|他|她}，思念着{mf|他|她}。她说，她对责任、力量、怜悯没有任何渴望，也完全不想离开这里，因为由她的思想催生出来的怪物依然非常强大，她必须把它们全部消灭。但即便如此，她最终还是站起了身，追随着她曾发誓追随的那个人，因为她的责任感最终战胜了她心灵的煎熬。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Les yeux de l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin s'ouvrirent et elle répondit qu'elle n'avait pas attendu, qu'{mf|il|elle} ne lui avait pas manqué, qu'elle ne cherchait ni le devoir, ni le pouvoir, ni la pitié, et qu'elle n'avait aucune envie de partir, car les monstres engendrés par son esprit n'avaient pas été vaincus. Cependant, elle se leva et suivit {mf|celui|celle} à qui elle avait prêté serment. Car son devoir l'emportait sur les tourments de son esprit. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Les yeux de l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin s'ouvrirent et elle répondit qu'elle n'avait pas attendu, qu'{mf|il|elle} ne lui avait pas manqué, qu'elle ne cherchait ni le devoir, ni le pouvoir, ni la pitié, et qu'elle n'avait aucune envie de partir, car les monstres engendrés par son esprit n'avaient pas été vaincus. Cependant, elle se leva et suivit {mf|celui|celle} à qui elle avait prêté serment. Car son devoir l'emportait sur les tourments de son esprit. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Ardından Domin'in gölgesinin gözleri açıldı. Verdiği yanıtta kendisinin onu beklemediğini, özlemediğini, ne vazife ne güç ne de merhamet peşinde olduğunu ve ayrılmaya hiç niyeti olmadığını söyledi. Çünkü zihninde canlanan canavarlar mağlup edilmemişti, hâlâ güçlülerdi. Ancak sonrasında ayağa kalkarak yeminle bağlı olduğunun peşine takıldı. Çünkü vazifesi, zihninin eziyetinden ağır basmıştı. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: And the eyes of the Domin's shadow opened, and she replied that she had not been waiting, had not missed {mf|him|her}, sought neither duty nor power nor mercy, and had no desire to leave, as the monsters spawned by her mind had not been defeated and were still strong. However, she then rose to her feet and followed the one she had sworn an oath to. For her duty outweighed her mind's torment. He is Death.
